conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts the 2D plan into an isometric 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and volume. Very slight perspective distortion on the lower left outer corner.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout issues: an extra interior wall was added bisecting the dining area that does not exist in the 2D plan. The stairs are also rendered as a flat graphic on the floor rather than 3D geometry.

interior_elements.notes: Dining furniture and kitchen counters present. Bathroom fixtures are represented by 2D floor decals instead of 3D models.

visual_clarity.notes: Lighting and materials are clean, but significant text contamination (unnecessary room labels) reduces the score.

detected_errors.description: Ghost wall added through the center of the plan, splitting the dining/living area.
Staircase is rendered as a 2D floor texture rather than 3D rising geometry.
Redundant text labels ('Lining Room', 'Bathroom') clutter the 3D space.

summary: A visually clean 3D conversion that suffers from significant geometric hallucinations, specifically the addition of non-existent walls and 2D-textured stairs.
